exclusion.criterion: A diagnosis of diabetes mellitus for which the patient uses insulin
exclusion.label: not_met

exclusion.criterion: Significant co-morbidities which, according to the treating nephrologists, makes it unlikely that the patient will be able to complete the foreseen study period

notes: The patient is a 3-day-old Asian female infant with uncomplicated neonatal jaundice. She does not have any significant co-morbidities that would make it unlikely for her to complete the study period.
